title: Game is lowering my monitor's refresh rate and color settings
body: I play with a 144hz but i've noticed for the past couple days that it's been noticably lowered to maybe 60hz. My FPS is usually in the 200s so I know that is not the problem. I also have my gamma and color calibrated for my monitor in Windows however whenever I launch a game it resets.

replies.body: I'm wondering if either an OS or monitor setting is overwriting the other.  For this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can review your specs and settings with you, and look for some options.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
